Description: Gilded wooden shabti of Tetinefer covered in wax inside a gilded wooden model coffin with a lid; Hieroglyphic text on lid and shabti.
Curator's comments: Published: N. Strudwick, The Legacy of Lord Carnarvon, Wyoming 2001, p. 25 [1].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition
Acquisition name: Donated by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
